name: GoldenEye 2D
description:
Go covert and infiltrate a secret enemy comms center, in this GameBoy demake of GoldenEye N64! Are you a 00-Agent or a worthless Klobb?
Graphics - Thomas McCloskey (@Gypopothomas)
Music - Eirik (@strotchy)
Coding - Bisse (@SveTob)

--- Changelog ---
Last Updated: v1.1 (2019-08-18)
- Oddjob's hat moves faster, deals 2 damage instead of instant kill...
- Jaws' health increased by 50%
- Game now runs well on Windows 7, 8, 10
- Font updated (wow) (cool)
